Package jioc.configurer

Interface ApplicationConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationApplicationConfig, XMLApplicationConfig
public interface ApplicationConfig
Main interface to provide configuration for an application. It provides a simple factory for components called Peas to be managed by the JIOC framework.
See Also:
XMLApplicationConfig, AnnotationApplicationConfig

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    <T> T getPea​(java.lang.Class<T> classObject)
    Return an instance of the class that implements the interface.

  • Method Details

    • getPea

      <T> T getPea​(java.lang.Class<T> classObject)
      Return an instance of the class that implements the interface. There should be no ambiguity when the JIOC scanning mechanism looks for an implementation registred using either XML-based or annotation-based configuration
      Parameters:
      classObject - interface type the pea must match
      Returns:
      an instance of the pea
      See Also:
      AnnotationApplicationConfig.getPea(Class), XMLApplicationConfig.getPea(Class)
